DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine chew gum increase energy expenditure decrease food intake .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Gum Chewing Energy Intake Expenditure
DOC.criteria: BMI 2737 , age 18 38 History chronic disease ( e.g . liver , kidney , heart disease , diabetes ) Medications affect energy expenditure , appetite , body composition ( e.g . antidepressant , beta blocker , antipsychotic , weight loss medication ) A history irregular menstrual cycle woman ( indication onset menopause metabolic disturbance polycystic ovary syndrome ) A history phenylketonuria ( PKU ) Symptoms depression A history eat disorder Concurrent participation weight loss program Cigarette smoking tobacco use Jaw problem temporomandibular joint disorder ( TMJ ) Allergies common component gum ( sweetener , mint flavor , etc ) Heavy gum chew prior study ( > 3 time per week ) Pregnancy lactation .
